name: Spaghetti
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until Al Dente and drain. Cook ground beef separately. Simmer beef in marinara sauce (~10 mins). Toss the cooked spaghetti in the sauce before serving. Optionally serve with Parmesan cheese

name: Instant Noodles
instructions: Boil noodles in salted water until soft and drain. Open sauce packets onto a plate. Mix noodles with sauce packets and a splash of pasta water. Optionally serve with {Sunny Side Eggs}

name: Peanut Noodles
ingredients: Noodles, Peanut Butter, Soy Sauce, Oyster Sauce, Sesame Oil, Green Onions
instructions: Boil noodles until soft. Mix peanut butter, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and oil. Mix sauce with noodles. Top with green onions
